items.description: Harness the power of questionable safety standards with this magical dust that makes everything go... boom, if you're not careful.
For when you need to extend your reach—but not your rights. Guaranteed to push, pull, and perhaps topple your dreams.
The simplest of machines, now with added 'pull to activate' convenience. Just don’t ask what it’s really controlling.
Press it, and something happens—usually. Guaranteed by DANDYCORP to work most of the time, except when it doesn’t.
For when you need to delay the inevitable. Perfect for stretching out the last seconds of whatever it is you're trying to avoid.
Sow the seeds of a future harvest—assuming it doesn't get eaten by something first. DANDYCORP assumes no responsibility for crop failure.
An orange root vegetable that’s as good for your health as it is for distracting your workforce with the promise of a better tomorrow.
Plant it, and with enough time (and a little corporate magic), you’ll have yourself a nice, tall reminder of the forests we destroyed.
Sweet, juicy, and perfect for a hot day. Provided that the DANDYCORP-approved weather doesn’t ruin your crops.
Spooky season or not, these seeds are ready to grow into the most versatile vegetable you’ll ever exploit for profit.
Another proud result of DANDYCORP's relentless mining operations. Refined, durable, and completely devoid of guilt!
Nothing says 'luxury' like a metal ripped from the earth with zero regard for environmental impact. Go ahead, indulge!
The hardest substance known to man, brought to you by the hardest-working (and poorly compensated) miners around.
DANDYCORP's token of appreciation—just kidding, it’s a symbol of how we trade value for your compliance.
Fossilized remnants of an era when the planet still had hope. Burn it like there's no tomorrow—because there might not be!
A metal uniquely brought to you by DANDYCORP. We are mostly certain it is not sentient, so it should not feel pain when you exploit it.
